# Task 4 b)

```{r}
set.seed(10000)
n <- 100
my <- 1
sigma_sq <- 4

# Draw from Norm Dist

x <- rnorm(n, mean = my, sd = sqrt(sigma_sq))

# Sufficient Stats

sum_x <- sum(x)
sum_x_sq <- sum(x^2)

# MLEs

mle_my <- mean(x)
mle_sigma_sq <- mean((x - mle_my)^2)

```

$$
\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = `r sum_x`
$$

$$
\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i^2 = `r sum_x_sq`
$$

$$
\hat{\mu} = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} x_i = `r mle_my`
$$

$$
\hat{\sigma}^2 = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i - \bar{x})^2 = `r mle_sigma_sq`
$$
